description: A funeral is held for recently identified victims as part of a memorial ceremony for the atrocity.
title: Srebrenica: Bosnia marks 25 years since massacre
title_page: Srebrenica: Bosnia marks 25 years since massacre - BBC News
maintext: Hasan Hasanovic told the BBC that he managed to get to safety by fleeing through the woods surrounding the town. "I spent six nights... being hunted," he said. "I saw many men and boys who were killed right in front of [me]. I was very scared."
